===Origin===
[[File:Crocodile_Cult_(Earth-616)_from_Black_Panther_Vol_5_3_0002.jpg|left|thumb]]
'''Crocodile Cult''' is an ancient religion of [[Wakanda]] that worshiped [[Sobek (Earth-616)|Sobek]] the "[[Crocodile God]]".{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 3}}

===Morlun===
Sometime later, a Crocodile Cult
resurrected [[Morlun (Earth-001)|Morlun]] so that he could devour the [[Black Panther]] totem and in turn weaken the nation of [[Wakanda]]. He instantly turned on the Cult killing them all.{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 #3}} As a start, Morlun fed on the long-term Panther adversary [[M'Baku (Earth-616)|Man-Ape]]. He was defeated by the new Black Panther [[Shuri (Earth-616)|Shuri]], who, with the help of a witch-doctor, sent Morlun into limbo,{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 #4}} where he was forced to battle the endless hordes of [[Death]].{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 #5}}{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 #6}}
